item.title: Typing in Python, Go and JavaScript
item.description: Disclaimer: This post has been written from the point-of-view of a software developer rather than a theoretical computer science. So I “ask for forgiveness” if the post seems too colloquial and pragmatic. Reading through the articles on programming languages, you are bound to stumble upon statements similar to the following: “Python is a strongly typed, dynamic language.” “Go is a statically typed, strong language.” “JavaScript is a dynamic language which is weakly typed.
